医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
酒精加上高海拔机舱压力可能会威胁睡眠飞机乘客的心脏健康呼吸系统杂志《Thorax》在线发表的第一项此类研究表明，巡航高度的酒精加上机舱压力可能会威胁睡眠飞机乘客的心脏健康，尤其是长途航班。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Alcohol-plus-cabin-Pressure-at-higher-altitude-may-threaten-sleeping-plane-passengers-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Alcohol-plus-cabin-Pressure-at-higher-altitude-may-threaten-sleeping-plane-passengers-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d0a106b-33a6-48b3-af8e-3fc90d5565c5 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 14:18:26 -0400 Alcohol plus cabin pressure at higher altitude may threaten sleeping plane passengers' heart health
抗生素的三重组合可能成为对抗耐药细菌的新武器在持续对抗抗生素耐药性的斗争中，凌卓人研究小组在《工程》杂志上发表的一项新研究揭示了一种很有前景的抗生素三重组合，它可以显着扩大我们对抗耐药细菌的武器库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Triple-combination-of-antibiotics-could-be-the-new-arsenal-against-drug-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Triple-combination-of-antibiotics-could-be-the-new-arsenal-against-drug-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d892f7e-465d-4e06-aa24-176128fed0f2 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 13:59:55 -0400 Triple combination of antibiotics could be the new arsenal against drug-resistant bacteria
患有多种疾病的老年人在炎热天气下住院的风险增加澳大利亚人对漫长炎热的夏季并不陌生，但格里菲斯大学的新研究探讨了炎热天气对已有慢性病患者的影响，以及如何增加他们住院的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Older-individuals-with-multimorbidity-at-increased-risk-of-hospitalization-during-hot-weather.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Older-individuals-with-multimorbidity-at-increased-risk-of-hospitalization-during-hot-weather.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16899fc4-12d7-4af6-9a8f-63c8697f1ca0 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 13:55:03 -0400 Older individuals with multimorbidity at increased risk of hospitalization during hot weather
BIOHIT HealthCare 将在 BSG LIVE'24 举办胃癌研讨会BIOHIT HealthCare 将于 6 月 17 日至 20 日参加在伯明翰国际会议中心举行的 BSG LIVE'24，届时将展示其广泛的胃肠道诊断解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/BIOHIT-HealthCare-to-host-symposium-on-gastric-cancer-at-BSG-LIVE24.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/BIOHIT-HealthCare-to-host-symposium-on-gastric-cancer-at-BSG-LIVE24.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a23953be-d1a0-4736-9f22-219c472d5131 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 11:37:00 -0400 BIOHIT HealthCare to host symposium on gastric cancer at BSG LIVE'24
机器学习可以为使用呼吸机的患者提供个性化的氧气水平补充氧气是世界上最广泛使用的治疗方法之一，估计全世界每年有 13 至 2000 万患者需要通过机械通气供氧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Machine-learning-could-personalize-oxygen-levels-for-病人-on-ventilators.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Machine-learning-could-personalize-oxygen-levels-for-病人-on-ventilators.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df2d64ba-4e9f-41ce-8f0c-0adfa62327ab Tue, 04 Jun 2024 11:04:22 -0400 Machine learning could personalize oxygen levels for patients on ventilators
面部热成像和人工智能组合为心脏病检测带来希望发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Health & Care Informatics 上的研究发现，面部热成像和人工智能 (AI) 的结合可以准确预测冠状动脉疾病的存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Facial- Thermal-imaging-and-AI-combo-shows-promise-for-heart-disease-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Facial- Thermal-imaging-and-AI-combo-shows-promise-for-heart-disease-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9f34bfe-001e-4344-be27-14581eea43c6 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 10:57:17 -0400 Facial thermal imaging and AI combo shows promise for heart disease detection
SU2C-SARC032试验：免疫疗法可将软组织肉瘤的复发风险降低43%在过去的三十年里，软组织肉瘤的突破很少，软组织肉瘤是影响肌肉、脂肪和其他结缔组织的罕见癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/SU2C-SARC032-trial-Immunotherapy-reduces-relapse-risk-in-soft-tissue-sarcoma-by-4325.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/SU2C-SARC032-tri-Immunotherapy-reduces-relapse-risk-in-soft-tissue-sarcoma-by-4325.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61f35665-895e-4211-9888-5a51540b3c97 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 10:12:16 -0400 SU2C-SARC032 trial: Immunotherapy reduces relapse risk in soft tissue sarcoma by 43%
蛋白质组分析揭示维尔纳综合征的性别二态性和免疫系统改变一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 10 期封面上，题为“Integrated Liver and Serum Proteomics”揭示衰老沃纳综合征小鼠模型中的性别二态性和几种免疫反应蛋白的改变。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Proteomic-profiling-reveals- Sex-dimorphism-and-immune-system-alterations-in-Werner-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Proteomic-profiling-reveals- Sex-dimorphism-and-immune-system-alterations-in-Werner-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d11e03bf-2775-440b-903b-5dcb99c448cf Tue, 04 Jun 2024 09:37:42 -0400 Proteomic profiling reveals sexual dimorphism and immune system alterations in Werner syndrome
开发新的计算方法将 DNA 标记与基因活性联系起来拉霍亚免疫学研究所 (LJI) 的科学家开发了一种新的计算方法，用于将 DNA 上的分子标记与基因活性联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/New-computational-method-development-for-linking-DNA-marks-to-gene-activity-This-Research-Pub.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/New-computational-method-development-for-linking-DNA-marks-to-gene-activity-This-Research-Pub.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db34d678-23cc-438e-9f62-da102096a0b1 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 09:10:00 -0400 New computational method developed for linking DNA marks to gene activity
加纳“造林者”Tonyrinaudo 在诺尔现场践行世界愿景，走向绿色总部位于柏林的高科技实验室测量设备制造商 KNAUER 于 2024 年 5 月 29 日在其工厂举办了一场有 120 名嘉宾参加的可持续发展活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Go-green-in-Ghana-e28098forestmakere28099-Tonyrinaudo-with-world-vision-on-site-at-Knauer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Go-green-in-Ghana-e28098forestmakere28099-Tonyrinaudo-with-world-vision-on-site-at-Knauer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49f3e90c-861b-4564-a36c-06c206724520 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 08:28:00 -0400 Go green in Ghana ‘forestmaker’ Tonyrinaudo with world vision on site at Knauer
